author: jeffbi

comments.author: iSazonov
daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@jeffbi @iSazonov Thank you both for the great work and thoroughness! I will merge this one once Travis CI passes. If you are ready to add more new tests, feel free to open another PR.

BTW, @iSazonov, do you mind clicking "Review Changes" on the right top corner of the ["Files Changed"](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/3110/files) page and select "Approve"? Thanks!

title: Provide additional tests for the *-Job cmdlets
